tool_description: Sports data and odds Bets Api for all sports: football, basketball, hockey, tennis, cricket, eSports
name: Sports odds BetApi
title: Sports odds BetApi

api_list.name: Data Country

required_parameters.name: SportId
required_parameters.description: number sport [1 or 2 or 3]. All data = 0

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-odds-betapi.p.rapidapi.com/v1/countries/1/line/en"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-odds-betapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-odds-betapi.p.rapidapi.com/v1/{typeparams}/{sportid}/{typeodds}/{langodds}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-odds-betapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Data Country All
